x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_ru.description: When a project task's top_task changes, This BR 1) Changes the top_task value on the current task's time_card, resource_allocation_daily records. 2) If the current task was previously a top_task, Deletes any task type breakdowns on the current task. 3) If the current task has descendants, it updates the top_task for the descendant's cost_plan,benefit_plan, resource_plan, time_card and resource_allocation_daily. 4) If double expense line creation is enabled, it creates negative expense lines for the old top_task's duplicate expense lines and creates duplicate expense lines on the new top_task 5) If double expense line creation is disabled and rollups are enabled, then actuals are recalculated for previous and current top_task
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_business_ru.name: Update toptask for descendant & related
